channel.title: Oracle views not displayed
channel.description:
Hello Redash Team I hope you are doing well
I have integrated redash with Oracle using version 9, I can connect to my oracle db and query some tables, but I cannot see any views, is that expected? or is there something else I need to run at redash to be able to see oracle views?
Thanks

item.title: Oracle views not displayed
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
When you say you cannot “see” views, do you mean you can’t query them? Or that they don’t appear in the schema browser?

Read full topic
